title: Episode 294: Little Simz
description: “Free” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Little Simz is a rapper from England who put out her first album in 2015. She’s won the Mercury Prize, a Brit Award, and three MOBO awards. She also starred in the Netflix series Top Boy. Her most recent album is called Lotus. title: Ariana Grande Checking In to Brother Frankie’s ‘Hotel Rock Bottom’ Remix: Here’s When It Arrives
description: "This song is so personal to me, and having her on it makes it even more meaningful," Frankie Grande says of the new version of his debut album's title track.

title: ‘Big Time Rush’ Creator Sues Sony Music for Allegedly Cheating Him Out of Reunion Tour Profits
description: Scott Fellows claims Sony intentionally cut him out of a 2021 licensing deal that allowed Big Time Rush to reunite as an independent entity in exchange for 10% of future revenues.
author: Rachel Scharf

title: RZA Celebrates 56th Birthday at Phish Show, Gets Shoutout from Band
description: RZA made the most of a day off from Wu-Tang Clan's farewell tour, also meeting Trey Anastasio and company backstage. RZA Celebrates 56th Birthday at Phish Show, Gets Shoutout from Band Scott Sterling

title: Billy McFarland Says His Seven-Figure Deal to Sell Fyre Fest Has Fallen Through

title: Alesso and Sentinel Channel Raw Emotion on Thunderous New Single "Freedom"
